1.Performing crunches donâ€™t require any of those fancy gym equipment. All you need is some space and a will to stay fit. \n 2.Not only doing crunches helps you in getting a toned and ripped mid-section but it also strengthens your stabilizer muscles like spinal erector muscles. \n 3.A 10 minute of moderate crunch session burns about 54 calories for a 160-pound male while increasing the intensity for a 10-minute crunch session can burn about 100 calories.
